column1: Little Goat Diner////I got the pork belly pancake. The pancake itself was kind of burnt in the center and the pork belly was really fatty (I get it's supposed to be fatty
column2: but this was like 100% fat) so while the first bite was delicious
column3: it quickly became unpleasant. I did like the bok choy salad and dressing
column4: it complemented the richness of the pork belly nicely.
